commit.message:
flow.c (make_edges): Fix insn iteration.

	* flow.c (make_edges): Fix insn iteration.
	(find_basic_blocks): Assign NULL_RTX, not 0, to rtx.
	(find_basic_blocks_1): Fix spelling mistake.
